# Welcome to the Help Website

This website was created as a resource for our classmates. We hope this can help you in your academic career. -Student Council

## Getting Started

Here you’ll find tutorials, guides, and tips to help you with your coursework and projects.

## Most Important Links for Students:

-   [Bruin Grad Pass](https://transportation.ucla.edu/getting-to-ucla/public-transit/bruin-grad-pass) - Bus and metro free for Grad Students

-   [UCLA Emergency Meal Swipes](https://studentincrisis.ucla.edu/economic-crisis-response
) - Complete this form for free meal swipes, 14 for international students and 7 for US students

-   Consult with Jeremy and Antoine for custom resume and interview guidance.

-   [Counseling and Psychological Services (CAPS)](https://www.counseling.ucla.edu/) - Mental health services

## Additional Information

-   [Meet the Team!](https://www.anderson.ucla.edu/degrees/master-of-financial-engineering/meet-our-team-overview)
-   **Contact:** mfe\@anderson.ucla.edu
-   **Office:** UCLA Anderson Room C401

## Academic Resources {#academic-resources}

::: ucla-accent
Access course materials, study spaces, and academic support to excel in your program.
:::

### Course Materials

-   [UCLA Library](https://www.library.ucla.edu/) - Access UCLA Library
-   [UCLA BruinLearn](https://bruinlearn.ucla.edu/) - UCLA's Coursework Program (also known as Canvas)
-   [Anderson Course Catalog](https://www.anderson.ucla.edu/degrees/master-of-financial-engineering/academics) - Browse MFE Courses

### Study Spaces

-   [UCLA Study Room Reservations](https://www.asucla.ucla.edu/ucla/ucla-study-room-reservation) - Library study rooms for reservation
-   [Anderson Study Rooms](https://www.anderson.ucla.edu/rosenfeld-library) - Reservation for study rooms can be made at the front desk

### Tutoring and Academic Support

-   Reach out to the MFE team for any extra academic needs such as increased test time, or scheduling help.

Navigate tuition, fees, financial aid, and employment opportunities with these essential resources.

```{=html}
<script>
// Script to highlight the active TOC link
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Get all section headers
  const sections = document.querySelectorAll('h2[id], h3[id]');
  
  // Function to highlight active TOC link
  function highlightTOC() {
    let currentSection = '';
    
    sections.forEach(section => {
      const sectionTop = section.offsetTop;
      const sectionHeight = section.offsetHeight;
      
      if (window.scrollY >= (sectionTop - 100)) {
        currentSection = section.getAttribute('id');
      }
    });
    
    // Remove active class from all TOC links
    document.querySelectorAll('#TOC a').forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('toc-active');
    });
    
    // Add active class to current section's TOC link
    if (currentSection) {
      const activeLink = document.querySelector(`#TOC a[href="#${currentSection}"]`);
      if (activeLink) activeLink.classList.add('toc-active');
    }
  }
  
  // Listen for scroll events
  window.addEventListener('scroll', highlightTOC);
  
  // Add animation class to sections
  document.querySelectorAll('.resource-section').forEach(section => {
    section.classList.add('section');
  });
});
</script>
```
